Ofosu Asamoah (amụrụ na 25 Nọvemba 1969) bụ onye ọka iwu ma bụrụ onye otu ndị omeiwu na-anọchite anya mpaghara Kade na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ghana.
Ọ si Kade, obodo dị na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ghana. O nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts na Law na Political Science na Mahadum Ghana n'afọ 1994
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta nzere bachelọ nke iwu na Ghana School of Law n'afọ 1997.
Ofosu bụ onye New Patriotic Party
Ọ bụ onye otu kọmitii maka Iwu, Iwu na Omeiwu, Iwu enyemaka
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu nzuko omeiwu 5th nke Republic of Ghana nke anọ na-anọchite anya mpaghara Kade mgbe a họpụtara ya ọzọ n'ọkwa na ntuli aka mba Ghana nke afọ 2008
Ọ na-agba ọsọ nke 4 okwu n'ọfịs malite na Jenụwarị 2001 wee hapụ ọrụ na Jenụwarị 2017.
